languages.text: "Эта роскошь прижимает к земле, как гравитационная хватка сего мира. Золоченное ярмо".
languages.translation_comment: Idira: "Get a load of this... My eyes hurt just looking at all the marble and gold. The bosses back on Leira, my homeworld, they lived in mansions like this."

languages.text: "All this luxury pins you to the ground like the gravitational grip of this world. A gilded yoke."
languages.original_text: "Эта роскошь прижимает к земле, как гравитационная хватка сего мира. Золоченное ярмо".

traits.locale_text: "All this luxury pins you to the ground like the gravitational grip of this world. A gilded yoke."
"All this luxury pins you to the ground like the gravitational grip of this world. A gilded yoke."
"All this luxury pins you to the ground like the gravitational grip of this world. A gilded yoke."
"All this luxury pins you to the ground like the gravitational grip of this world. A gilded yoke."
"All this luxury pins you to the ground like the gravitational grip of this world. A gilded yoke."

languages.text: "All der Luxus drückt einen zu Boden wie die Schwerkraft dieser Welt. Ein vergoldetes Joch."
languages.original_text: "All this luxury pins you to the ground like the gravitational grip of this world. A gilded yoke."

traits.locale_text: "All der Luxus drückt einen zu Boden wie die Schwerkraft dieser Welt. Ein vergoldetes Joch."

languages.text: « Tout ce luxe vous cloue au sol aussi sûrement que la force gravitationnelle à laquelle ce monde est soumis. Ce n'est jamais qu'un carcan doré. »
languages.original_text: "All this luxury pins you to the ground like the gravitational grip of this world. A gilded yoke."

traits.locale_text: « Tout ce luxe vous cloue au sol aussi sûrement que la force gravitationnelle à laquelle ce monde est soumis. Ce n'est jamais qu'un carcan doré. »

languages.text: «Todo este lujo te ata al suelo como la gravedad del planeta. Es un yugo dorado».
languages.original_text: "All this luxury pins you to the ground like the gravitational grip of this world. A gilded yoke."

traits.locale_text: «Todo este lujo te ata al suelo como la gravedad del planeta. Es un yugo dorado».

languages.text: 「この贅沢は、この世の重力のように、地面に釘付けにする。金色のくびきね」
languages.original_text: "All this luxury pins you to the ground like the gravitational grip of this world. A gilded yoke."

traits.locale_text: 「この贅沢は、この世の重力のように、地面に釘付けにする。金色のくびきね」

languages.text: “这一切奢侈之物就像这个世界的引力一样，将你牢牢束缚，为你戴上镀金的枷锁。”
languages.original_text: "All this luxury pins you to the ground like the gravitational grip of this world. A gilded yoke."

traits.locale_text: “这一切奢侈之物就像这个世界的引力一样，将你牢牢束缚，为你戴上镀金的枷锁。”

languages.original_text: "All this luxury pins you to the ground like the gravitational grip of this world. A gilded yoke."

languages.text: "Tüm bu ihtişam, seni tıpkı bu dünyanın yer çekimi kuvveti gibi yere çekiyor. Yaldızlarla süslenmiş bir boyunduruk."
languages.original_text: "All this luxury pins you to the ground like the gravitational grip of this world. A gilded yoke."
